title: Textile, "Hommage de l'Amerique a la France (America paying homage to France)", ca. 1783
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp: 85 cm (33 1/2 in.). Weft: (left selvage) 98 cm (38 1/2 in.).
Width of plate: 94.5 cm (37 1/4 in.).
description: American Indians before the (uncrowned) figure of France. In blue on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Hommage de l'Amerique a la France (America paying homage to France)", ca. 1783.
ca. 1783. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-287.
